Chief of Police -- Town of Baldwin
PW Law Enforcement District -- 1/2% S&U - Sheriff
Race.SummaryText:
Law Enforcement District Proposition
(1/2% Sales Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall Law Enforcement District of the Parish of St. Mary, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy and collect in the District an additional tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (the "Tax"), in perpetuity, commencing April 1, 2015, upon the sale at retail, the use, lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property, and on sales of services, as defined by law (an estimated $5,150,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be dedicated and used for the purposes of constructing, acquiring, improving and operating law enforcement facilities, vehicles and equipment and funding general operations of the District?
